Bjelica van kontrole: VAR je cirkus i nešto skandalozno, VAR je s*anje!
Trener Dinama ne može da prežali viđena tri boda protiv Šahtjora...

06 Nov 2019

Mnogo zamerki imali su Zagrepčani tokom samog meča Dinamo - Šahtjor, žalili se kako im nisu dosuđena dva penala, a na kraju, kao šlag na tortu, sudija Feliks Brih počastio ih je najstrožom kaznom - ali protiv njih! 
Opšti je utisak da je suđenje bilo kriminalno, o čemu je posle meča govorio i trener Modrih Nenad Bjelica. On nije mogao da se iskontroliše, pa može da očekuje drakonsku kaznu UEFA...
Za početak, nedosuđeni prekršaji u šesnaestercu nad Ademijem i Petkovićem?"Ako ne žele da gledaju snimke, šta će nam taj VAR?! Ja uvek govorim da je VAR obično s*anje! Ubija emocije, ubija igru. To je cirkus. Pogledajte koliki je cirkus u Engleskoj. U Italiji je tek cirkus! I dalje se tumačenje spornih situacija svodi na interpretaciju. Čemu onda to? Ukinite onda taj VAR. Ja sam apsolutno protiv VAR-a, on ubija emocije, ubija fudbal".
Penala za Dinamo nema, ali ima za Šahtjor..."Zašto imamo VAR? Kada u toj situaciji sudija prvo svira faul na Tajsonu, a onda vraća na nešto drugo, ali na ono što nije bilo, a to je prekršaj Đire. Da se razumemo, prekršaj Teofila na tajsonu je bio i to je čisti penal, ali stvar je u tome da je sudija gledajući snimak to okrenuo i dao penal za drugu situaciju, u tome je stvar! VAR je cirkus i nešto skandalozno! Rekao sam to kada sam radio u Poljskoj, evo i sada ću u Hrvatskoj i u Ligi šampiona", nije mogao da se smiri Bjelica. 
I na kraju?"Zaslužili smo pobedu, bili smo bolji. Čestitam mojim momcima".

Foto: Reuters

White out of control: VAR is a circus and something scandalous, VAR is a shit!
Coach Dinamo can't rush over three points against Shakhtar ...

06 Nov 2019

Zagreb residents had many objections during the Dinamo-Shakhtar match, complained that they were not awarded two penalties, and in the end, as the icing on the cake, Judge Felix Brih treated them with the most severe punishment - but against them!
The general impression is that the trial was criminal, which was discussed after the match by Blue coach Nenad Bjelica. He couldn't control himself, so he could expect a draconian UEFA penalty ...
For starters, unconfirmed fouls on a sixteenth over Ademi and Petkovic? "If they don't want to watch the recordings, what will this VAR do to me ?! I always say that VAR is usually a shit! It kills emotions, it kills the game. It's a circus. "It's a circus in England. It's just a circus in Italy! Still, the interpretation of disputed situations comes down to interpretation. Why then? Cancel that VAR. I'm absolutely against the VAR. It kills emotions, kills football."
There is no penalty for Dynamo, but it is for Shakhtar ... "Why do we have VAR? When in that situation the referee first plays a foul on Tyson and then goes back to something else, but to what was not, which is a Giro offense. we understand, Theophilus's offense in tyson was and is a pure penalty, but the thing is, the judge turned it around and gave a penalty for another situation, that's the thing! VAR is a circus and something scandalous! I said that when I worked in Poland, here I am now in Croatia and in the Champions League ", Bjelica could not calm down.
And finally? "We deserved the win. We were better. Congratulations to my boys."
